name: straightness
content:
straightness noun [U]
(NOT CURVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not bending or curving or not sloping to either side, or the degree to which something is like this: There is more to art than the straightness of lines and the perfection of surfaces. He uses the straight edge of his level to check the straightness of the bricks. How do you measure straightness?

(HONESTY)

straightness noun [U]
(SEXUALITY)
the fact of being sexually or romantically attracted to men if you are a woman, and to women if you are a man: She respected her gay friends but she was comfortable with her own straightness.
